FFXIVTexTools2.log:
Application: - Added the ability to change directory for Index Backup folder and Modlist file. - Added error checking when reading the games items list. - Added missing Egi (Sephirot & Bahamut). - Added discord link. - Added tutorials link to Help menu.
3D: - Removed warning for having extra texture coordinates as that is now taken care of internally.
Bug Fixes: - Fixed an issue where models were not able to be imported if there was a gap in part numbers. - Fixed an issue where data was being read incorrectly on importing a model for a second time. - Fixed an issue where DX version setting would not save, and would be DX11 after restarting the application every time. - Fixed an issue where RGBA toggles were not selectable on UI items. - Fixed an issue where texture variations of Pets were not displaying in 3D view. - Other minor bug fixes.
Known Issues: - Some or All model imports crash the game when using the DX9 client.
